instruction: Generate a list of ways companies can use data to predict customer behavior
output:
1. Analyzing customer demographics
2. Tracking purchase habits and patterns
3. Examining website usage and engagement
4. Monitoring customer feedback
5. Estimating pricing elasticity
6. Assessing customer loyalty
7. Analyzing customer lifetime value 
8. Leveraging customer segmentation
9. Examining customer relationships
10. Studying customer interactions
